website_summaries.verdict: The Asics Gel Quantum 180 is a reliable neutral running shoe for the roads. Even if the shoe is expensive, it delivers superb cushioning, comfort, and support at the cost of extra grams. It offers nice arch support and is suited best for runners looking for a workhorse of a training partner.
pros: Uses Rearfoot Gel Cushioning in the heel for proven shock absorption and cushioning features
The Quantum 180 has premium cushioning with very noticeable spring to it based on the reviews online
6 color variations to suit the fashion styles of everyone
Comfort comes second to none as agreed by a large number of users
Several runners gave a favorable verdict to how the upper hugs the foot in comfort and support
Moving through the gait cycle as effortless is a common observation for a couple of other users
cons: Some feel that the shoe is heavy
Traction becomes a little tricky when it gets wet, remarked a few testers
The heel is a bit wide, which frustrated some runners

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, my favorite running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I'm an Asics girl. I've been running regularly for a few years now (usually 20-30 miles a week). I used to go with the Gel Kayano shoes (another great style), but I decided to give these a shot last year...and I haven't gone back. They are much lighter than the Kayanos, and they seem to have more cushion/bounce. They don't have quite as much stability as the Kayanos do, but they are adequate. They also don't last quite as long as the Kayanos have for me. Side notes: Be careful running on wet surfaces with these shoes--I slip almost every time. Also, I prefer these shoes over the Quantum 360s; the 360s have way too much cushion for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and cushioned, these did the trick.
customer_reviews.text: I go these for my 86-year-old mother who walks every single day. She had been wearing "walking shoes" that were giving her feet sores. I decided to look for running shoes that might be more comfortable for her. Lightweight and cushioned, these did the trick. No doubt she is the most stylish senior in town! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Just My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I have other ASICS athletic shoes is the same size I ordered, but these are too small. Also the teal looking color on the back is more of a bright green in person. I just returned them, did not exchange because of the color discrepancy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've had them for 4 weeks now and I still love them. No more spending $160 for tennis shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women's 12 so finding stylish tennis shoes are impossible to find in Tucson. I wear these for work - I work as a nurse so I'm on my feet for 10 out of 12 hours three times per week. I've had them for 4 weeks now and I still love them. No more spending $160 for tennis shoes at Footlocker (men's tennis shoes}. I am unable to find nurses shoes that fit me that are stylish (Black is not stylish). They are supportive enough for me and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Loved them at first.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 7, but I ordered a 6.5 in these, and they fit fine. I did love them at first. They look good and I love the bright colors. However, the area around the ankle has started to wear away. Keep in mind, I wear these to work at the YMCA, only 2 days a week, and the shifts are only 3 hours long. I have only owned these for 2-3 months. I am disappointed. I was hoping they'd be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: kejafu

customer_reviews.title: I normally love Asisc shoes
customer_reviews.text: I normally love Asisc shoes. I think this shoe is great for a non runner or short distance runner- not a probate. I am a runner and need shoes with a lot of support. These don't offer that. They are cushy and comfortable but I felt the impact of running by the 6th mile. The backs of the shoes are a little high and blistered both my ankles. Also, buy thenm one half size larger, they run small. I have to say I was disappointed in these shoes, normally a retail value of a running shoe over $100 has never disappointed me, but this one did.
customer_reviews.author: kim stewart

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other reviews about the quality of these shoes. Not happy at all. I have owned several Asics and they lasted very long time. These shoes are yes very comfortable but this is the 3rd time I wear them and they ripped already. As you can see in the picture , the back also looks as if I have worn them for a very long Time. Not worth the money. I might need to get a new pair soon
customer_reviews.author: cataloca17@hotmail.com

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my wife whom is about to run her first half marathon. she had been running in some old Nike's she had, which were adequate but not proper. We shopped many shoes and stores and came across these and she fell in love with them. Offer great arch support, have a nice snug fit without being too tight, and offer great cushioning. Amazon pricing happened to beat out all the mortar and brick stores as well as some reputable on line stores.
customer_reviews.author: R.S

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great, comfortable shoes. I do a lot of standing/walking for my job and these seem to help my feet more than Nike, under armour, etc. I love them so far. Update: I've had these shoes for about 4 months now. Only wearing them on weekends. They do acquire holes rather easily (I got the first hole within the first month of having them) and unfortunately the gel part on the back seems to fray/peel. They've been good shows but now I need another pair due to holes in the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Very cushion-y!
customer_reviews.text: I like these. I'm normally a 7.5 but in sneakers I always size up to an 8. They are very gelly/cushiony my feet sink into them. At first I wasn't sure about them for this reason but they are great. They are also somewhat chunky looking which wasn't my favorite but they still serve their purpose for working out in.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Weird sizing
customer_reviews.text: I love Asics running shoes and was very excited to get these. I typically order a half size up in Asics and get a 7.5 as I did with these Quantum 180s. When these arrived, I could immediately tell that they seemed larger. Upon trying them on and taking them for a spin, it was clear that for some odd reason these shoes run larger than other Asics. I am keeping them but I do not love them like I love my Preleus and Cummulus. Also, the heel of these shoes seems high and large. I guess they are simply too big.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Maiorana

customer_reviews.title: Sore feet after running and after tennis
customer_reviews.text: They felt comfortable at first, but they failed in action. My feet hurt after running (like a mile or two) and after tennis. I tried to push through it bc they were still practically brand new, but it just got worse. I would not recommend buying these. My feet have been happier with Asics Culumus and Flex.
customer_reviews.author: ThinkerBelle

customer_reviews.title: These are the most comfortable ASICs I own
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable ASICs I own. They have plenty of cushion and keep my feet from aching after a step or hi-fitness aerobics class. The toe box may be a little tight for running, but they give excellent support for side to side movement.
customer_reviews.author: tshef

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not durable
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits correctly and the colors are exactly as the picture shows. The problem I have with them is the quality. Part of the tread started peeling from the bottom within a month of light use, and the material along my Achilles is frayed and torn after 3 months. I wear them almost daily for work and to the gym, but I still expect a shoe like this to stand up for longer. I may be going back to Saucony after this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: 5-9 but for some reason I have no idea what my shoe size is when it comes to asics which is a bummer because I've always heard g
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are as pictured. However, my feet were too small for the 9.5 and too big for the 9. I usually toggle between 8.5-9 but for some reason I have no idea what my shoe size is when it comes to asics which is a bummer because I've always heard good things about this brand.
customer_reviews.author: KaraBelli

customer_reviews.title: No arch support, try the cumulus or nimbus instead
customer_reviews.text: Fit well when I ordered my regular size and did not size up like I normally do in running shoes, but I have high arches and these have no support. I’ll stick with the ASICS nimbus as my plush running shoe, and the mizuno wave rider as my daily.
customer_reviews.author: Lynzeeroo

customer_reviews.title: Run a bit large
customer_reviews.text: I have worn asics as a runner for more than 20 years. I know what size I am and rarely need to try on the shoe as long as the fit is neutral. These seem so much larger than any other asics shoe i have bought in the same size. I can't run in them, but I am keeping because the price was good, the shoe is super cute, and I can wear them for non-running things just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable and Funtional
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 6 1/2 but usually always buy a size 7 running shoe. Bought the 7 here and they fit great. I run about 25 miles a week. So far I like these shoes a lot. They have very soft soles. Plus bonus they're pink and fun. I've gotten a lot of compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Ong

customer_reviews.title: They run big and small in the tox box.
customer_reviews.text: I buy nothing but ASICS for the gym for the past 6 years. I’m a 7.5 and I’ve always purchased a half size up with all my ASICS, 8 fit me perfect! But with these I was swimming in my 8’s, I exchanged them for 7.5 and it’s true the tox box runs small. The first day my toes were killing me but after breaking them in they’re perfect. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker. I have high arches and bad ankles
customer_reviews.text: Great sneaker. I have high arches and bad ankles. Supportive without being too clunky. Used to buy 7.5 in asics to account for swelling, but for these I bought a 7 and they feel better. My street size is 6.5.
customer_reviews.author: bugly91

customer_reviews.title: Gave me blisters; had to return
customer_reviews.text: Gave me blisters. The edge goes up quite high in the heel, which gave me blisters and scraped against my ankle bone with every step. I had to return the shoes, and the seller gave me a refund.
customer_reviews.author: HNB

customer_reviews.title: Sizing way off
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a huge disappointment. They fit so different from my others. Too narrow and too small at the toe. Feels like no support what so ever. If your on your feet all day. Do not buy. I can wear them without socks for two hours. Sucks for a 70 dollar pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sjm

customer_reviews.title: but I'm an ASICS loyalist because they're just the best for my feet that I've found
customer_reviews.text: These are not my style pick, but I'm an ASICS loyalist because they're just the best for my feet that I've found. I run inside and out, about 20 miles a week. I got a blister for the first time ever on my first two runs, but they're been great ever since.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: They feel good running and the bottoms don't wear out as quick ...
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of the 180's. They feel good running and the bottoms don't wear out as quick as some of the other styles.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are very comfortable but literally falling apart in the first 35 days ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very comfortable but literally falling apart in the first 35 days of wearing them. I have been a runner for a long time and I have owned several pairs of shoes. I have never seen a paid of shoes do this. Only gave them a 2 because of the comfort level.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lynn Reviews

customer_reviews.title: My feet feel great in them while working out
customer_reviews.text: I have two pairs of these. One in black and gold and the blue green and yellow ones. They fit perfectly and are lightweight. My feet feel great in them while working out. I definitely recommend these as either a workout or walking sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are so comfortable. I bought them to walk my dogs as ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable. I bought them to walk my dogs as the tread on my last ones wore out. These are so cute I had to get another dog walking pair because they were too pretty to mess up!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: still my favorite pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: So much love for these shoes. Fit, comfort, color... everything about it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Order true to size for running- not 1/2 size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Colors are awesome, but the shoe fit big for my taste- unlike other Asics I've owned in the past. I ordered up a 1/2 size as I normally do for my running shoes and it wasn't needed for these- big toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So so stiff! Unlike my other asics these will ...
customer_reviews.text: So so stiff! Unlike my other asics these will need weeks of breaking in soles. Probably fine for light gym workouts but not if your hitting the pavement. Going to return but the shipping/ packaging was great. No issues with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Maybelle

customer_reviews.title: They are super comfy. I spend more than 12 hours on ...
customer_reviews.text: I have these shoes in a different color. This pair seemed to run a little bigger. They are super comfy. I spend more than 12 hours on my feet a day so I think they hold up to the test.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for standing
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of ASICS. The first 2 were the gel Cumulus 17 and they were great for standing in one spot all day. These are good but are a little hard and do not feel like they have as much cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Adorable sneakers:)))
customer_reviews.text: I adore this sneakers!!!. I got the pink ones and the color is super cute and vibrant. The shoes are very comfortable not only for running but also to be walking and standing up for many hours. These are a great buy: I got many compliments on how beautiful they are, super comfy and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: fgarat

customer_reviews.title: Fits narrower than other Asics I've worn. Also, ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits narrower than other Asics I've worn. Also, the shoe insert was more padded than normal and it pressed up on my arch wrong. I tried a different shoe insert but that did not alleviate the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Canoe

customer_reviews.title: 😩😩😩 But it is a fantastic show. My feet were in heaven
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 12 but this is a roomy shoe. I needed a size smaller, which they DON'T have in black!!! 😩😩😩 But it is a fantastic show. My feet were in heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes! I am a PE teacher with bad knees who is on my feet all day and these shoes are so comfortable and provide the support I need. Plus my students love the color so I am super cool right now :D
customer_reviews.author: D.W.

customer_reviews.title: Gotta say I love these. I've never owned a pair of Asics
customer_reviews.text: Gotta say I love these. I've never owned a pair of Asics, and figured I give these a try. The first day right out of the box, I ran 3 miles didn't bother me at all. was very comfy and light. Will def buy another pair when or as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Odemarys Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: VERY comfortable sneakers, with a lot of arch support
customer_reviews.text: VERY comfortable sneakers, with a lot of arch support, which I need. I am on my feet all day while at my job, and these help my feet tremendously. They fit just right, and have a lot of cushioning inside. These are well worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnie1959

customer_reviews.title: super comfortable. I work 16 hour shifts and these ...
customer_reviews.text: super comfortable. I work 16 hour shifts and these shoes provide great support and are not hard or firm at all. Just the right amount of cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Bradley

customer_reviews.title: It's great and comfortable for running
customer_reviews.text: It's great and comfortable for running, zumba - not so much. And as some mentioned before-they look big on your feet. I kept them, quality and design works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Yana B.

customer_reviews.title: The narrowed toe box is actually ok.
customer_reviews.text: I decided that I actually like these shoes and the narrow toe box does not bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoe, very cute but it did run a tad smaller than expected. If you have wide feet, I would probably suggest a different shoe. Otherwise I did love how they looked!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Coxx

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are nice and light and true to size
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are nice and light and true to size. The gel makes them nice and comfortable to wear all day. However, there is not enough arch support for me. Even though they are meant for running, I think that I will walk in these shoes and use them for work. Without the adequate are support I feel like they may leave me in pain if I try running.
customer_reviews.author: Yuridia Reynoso

customer_reviews.title: At first wearing my feet hurt like hell, but it was because I had to ...
customer_reviews.text: At first wearing my feet hurt like hell, but it was because I had to break them in, then realized that they weren't the wide foot that I ordered but now they feel like a glove love them and next time I will make sure I get the right ones
customer_reviews.author: Ketta

customer_reviews.title: Had to return them
customer_reviews.text: This was much larger than multiple usual gel nimbus. Also felt like I would roll my ankle if I tried to wear them. Not neutral enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gym Rat 71

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. TERRIBLE QUALITY.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these running shoes for 6 months and they are already falling apart! I don't even run every day and they are showing signs of tearing around the laces. Extremely disappointed! If you were considering these shoes, keep looking. They are not worth the price you pay for them to only fall apart 6 months later.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Clarin

customer_reviews.title: the accent colors look great and really give the shoe a nice pop
customer_reviews.text: Snug but completely do-able. For white shoes, the accent colors look great and really give the shoe a nice pop!
customer_reviews.author: S. R. Hayslett

customer_reviews.title: Walking on concrete all day and running.
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this shoe. I only wear Asics for work. I walk a lot all day on concrete and run as well. So having a good pair of tennis shoes is a must. So far I only wore for a few hours. I love the colors of these shoes and the look. :) They do feel a little small. But I will wear them in, hopefully they will fit perfectly soon and last a long time :) Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: but so comfortable. I will definitely be ordering another
customer_reviews.text: They run just a smidge on the bigger side, but so comfortable. I will definitely be ordering another pair
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sawicki

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size!
customer_reviews.text: Entirely too large. Attempted to contact company for an exchange. Insisted on a return, then exchange. But the bullet because I didn't want to be without for 2-4 weeks. Very disappointed as Asics usually run small....and these most certainly did not.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea roberson

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, but these are sized wrong. I always need an 8.5 in running or tennis shoes, but I had to go up a size for these.
customer_reviews.author: noneofyourbusiness

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and love the colors
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and love the colors. It's not quite as cushy as the Nimbus but still very comfortable and keeps my feet feeling great walking and standing for long days.
customer_reviews.author: Jollygreen

customer_reviews.title: Too Short
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the fit. This is the 1st ASIC I bought that hasn't met my expectations. Sent them back
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Herold

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe as always, Asics. Sturdy shoe, and my foot feels well contained. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Long

customer_reviews.title: ASICS were recommend for my foot pronation
customer_reviews.text: ASICS were recommend for my foot pronation. I saw these in a retail store and feel in love with them. They were discontinuing this style and didn't have my size. I was excited to find them here cheaper. I am a nursing student and on my feet long hours. These shoes are awesome! Great support and flexibility when running. I highly recommend these! Great shipping, on time, as always!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Asics and these are my fourth or fifth pair
customer_reviews.text: I love Asics and these are my fourth or fifth pair, but I should've ordered these a half size bigger because they seem narrow up around the toes. I'm prone to ingrown nails, and I can't wear these long when my toe hurts! Great looking shoe though!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon120

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much, I'm ordering another pair to have when these wear out. Super cute and lightweight, perfect cushioning for running & working out.
customer_reviews.author: Your Mom

customer_reviews.title: Walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I red the review about the shoes and was so excited because I have bone spare on my heel. But the shoes either run small or too tight. I can't wear them for a long time unfortunately .
customer_reviews.author: Naji

customer_reviews.title: Great fit! shoe size fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe - beautiful vibrant colors that give you something nice to look at during a grueling cross-fit training session. Perfect fit! I must have lucked out! no complaints with this shoe. Packaging was brand new and untampered with. Great price, great quality, great packaging. No complaints here
customer_reviews.author: Alexlight

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes for Pickleball
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoes! They are great for Pickleball and other events. Very cushioned and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Wiggly1

customer_reviews.title: Might want to size up half a size.
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful and got many compliments but runs tight in the toe area. Tried to tough it out and let my foot get use to it but it is a bit unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: River

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them! Comfortable and good support unlike most running shoes now that are extremely thin and barely last a few months. These asics are not only stylish but I feel really comfortable running in them too. Normally it's painful to break in shoes but these aren't giving me any problems!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful shoes but not as comfortable as I expected. My previous Asics were quantum 360 and I loved them. These are harder and I ended up with knee pain so I realized they weren't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: I loved these at first
customer_reviews.text: I loved these at first, but I have only had them for a month, and the side on my right shoe is ripped. Bummer, because they feel great on my feet!
customer_reviews.author: Almcnorris

customer_reviews.title: I was experiencing heel pain and was looking for a running shoe that gave my heel extra cushioning and these are great! Heel pai
customer_reviews.text: I run 3 miles when I run and run about 3 times a week. I was experiencing heel pain and was looking for a running shoe that gave my heel extra cushioning and these are great! Heel pain has subsided!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Great colors, great for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: I have only worn them one day but so far loving them just as I have loved all my other ASICS. These do fit more snug around the width of my foot, but because I have narrow feet that is something I look for. The colors are even better in person. My socks tend to slip around in ASICS for the first few wears and these are no different but just need to be broken in. All around, great shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: New favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super comfy and look amazing. My only complaint is that the inner edges are already scuffing. It's been less than two weeks and the black is rubbing off showing some white spaces underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stands up to all day support
customer_reviews.text: I am on my feet all day. Since I have narrow feet, this style is great. At the end of the day, my feet weren't hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B

customer_reviews.title: Kinda Not.
customer_reviews.text: Basics is,my go to shoe but this one runs large and not as comfortable as my others
customer_reviews.author: Rita R Myers

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Colorful Shoes
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very comfortable shoe. I work 12 hour shifts and my feet don’t hurt when I get off work. I also get a lot of compliments about the colors.
customer_reviews.author: A. Summerson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I've never bought sneakers before without trying them on first, so I was nervous. Thankfully though, these are perfect! Not too tight, and Nice to walk in! I am very happy with these! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I'm an underpronator so these are perfect to help that issue. Very comfortable and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Callaway

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love these shoes I'm am Asics fan and these are by far the best I've had
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it !! Fit great super comfy will recommend!!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Linda F. Del Valle

customer_reviews.title: Best sneakers ever
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the most comfortable sneakers I've ever owed. They are also my first pair of ASICS. I will definitely buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: SED

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. I will be buying again in the future. They’ve lasted me a while
customer_reviews.author: katie hudson

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are worth every penny. I'm in the ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are worth every penny. I'm in the dental field and my feet had been killing me. These definitely improved my "tired feet".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You NEED these.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the most comfortable sneakers I have ever owned. Light weight, squishy inside like your walking on clouds. They look awesome too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Goudreau

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I always order my workout shoes a 1/2 size larger. I did that with these shoes and they are just a tad large, my heel slips a bit if I wear thin socks. The shoes have great stability and the perfect amount of cushioning. Will be keeping my eye out for more asics.
customer_reviews.author: Fruitcake24

customer_reviews.title: Still breaking it in
customer_reviews.text: I'm still breaking in the shoes but I am glad I bought these. Very comfortable when I run or do any aerobics classes
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Cee Cee

customer_reviews.title: Good advice, just right.
customer_reviews.text: After reading previous reviews I decided to order a half size up. Smart move and they fit great. I had a pair of similar asics a few years ago and got rid of them because they were too heavy. I was pleasantly surprised at how light they feel and how much they've improved. I will be buying them again!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie C.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are so comfortable and a must have for walking/running
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable and a must have for walking/running. They have a good arch support, true to size, and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An ASICS Fan 4 Many Years.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes. While I typically wear Motion Control Shoes for running. I found these shoes were great for walking, elliptical and strength training in an indoor gym.
customer_reviews.author: Mrsmanners862

customer_reviews.title: cheap poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Theses shoes didnt last longer that 1 month. If your looking to work out or run, don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Dance

customer_reviews.title: Go up a size and they’ll fit great!
customer_reviews.text: 3rd try and finally found the size that works! Go up a size and they’ll fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Meltx13

customer_reviews.text: Love my ASICS brand of sneaker and these don't disappoint. Use for running and training with good support and always love the funky colors that ASICS have.

customer_reviews.text: Asics shoes are the only shoes I wear because they fit and look great. These shoes were no exception. They were comfortable, to wear, right out of the box.

customer_reviews.title: I have a high arch and this shoe didn't support ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a high arch and this shoe didn't support that. Also, was more narrow than expected. Not enough room in the toe end of shoe.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are amazing!!! I'm a pronator an these provide the perfect stability for every step in long runs.

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy shoe but narrow
customer_reviews.text: Great support, high quality. Bought a half size up as recommended and they fit alright but they are really narrow. I may order the men's version next time.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased this brand in the past and will ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this brand in the past and will continue to in the future. It is well designed for my footprint. I believe I could wear them all day, if needed, but I prefer to wear athletic shoes for work-outs only.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe and look!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes, I have a flat foot so finding a good running shoe is hard. I get compliments all the time cant wait to buy another pair of Asics. I wear a 7 1/2 and it fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Asics are my favorite for cross training
customer_reviews.text: Asics are my favorite for cross training. I had bought a less expensive pair prior to these that did not have the support.

customer_reviews.text: Good support for walks. Not great for hikes, nice kush as runners.

product_meta.title: ASICS womens GEL-Quantum 180-W Gel-quantum 180-w
product_meta.description: Set your stride soaring in the ASICS® GEL-Quantum 180™ running shoe! Predecessor: None. Support Type: Neutral to underpronation (supination). Cushioning: Maximum cushioning. Surface: Road. Differential: 10 mm. Light, breathable textile and synthetic film upper materials. Nearly seamless upper design helps reduce the likelihood of irritation. Lace-up closure. Padded tongue and collar. Soft, breathable fabric lining for a great in-shoe feel. Removable ComforDry™ X-40 sockliner features antimicrobial properties for a drier, healthier environment. Solyte® midsole is lighter than standard EVA and SpEVA® designed by ASICS. Its responsive nature provides a supremely cushioned ride and makes it highly durable. Rearfoot and forefoot GEL® cushioning systems work together to better attenuate shock during impact and toe-off phases, and allowing movement in multiple planes as the foot transitions through the gait cycle. 180° of GEL® cushioning disperses impacting shock and sets the foot up for a buttery smooth transition to midstance. Heel/Toe: 22 mm/12 mm AHAR® rubber outsole delivers supreme durability. Trusstic System® offers support and a highly-responsive ride with each stride. ComforDry™ lasting supplies underfoot comfort, exceptional breathability, and antimicrobial technology. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 11 oz Product measurements were taken using size 7.5, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
feature_bullets: Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning Systems: Attenuates shock during impact and toe-off phases, and allows movement in multiple planes as the foot transitions through the gait cycle.
Seamless Construction: The use of seamless materials reduces the potential for irritation and friction caused by traditional stitches and seams.
Trusstic System: Reduces the weight of the sole unit while retaining the structural integrity of the shoe.
Solyte Midsole Material: A lighter weight midsole compound than ASICS' standard EVA and SpEVA. Also features enhanced cushioning and durability.
ComforDry X-40 Sockliner: This premium sockliner features higher rebound properties while providing excellent moisture management, high-level breathability, and anti-microbial properties.
